price: Kí o sì sọ pé: “Ǹjẹ o máa ṣàfọ̀mọ́ ara rẹ (kúrò nínú àìgbàgbọ́) bí?
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
